overview: "Compilation" of five previous works of the director - Leaving Church, Damaged, 27 Thoughts About My Dad, Rain, Buffalo Death Mask - Father Auditions is a prism that reflects different images and at the same time, in the assembly of the distinguished short films, contemplates a single figure - that of the father - as lack, ghost of the past, enigma to which it was not possible to find an answer.
title: Father Auditions
